name: SCAMP
paper: Matrix Profile XIV: Scaling Time Series Motif Discovery with GPUs to Break a Quintillion Pairwise Comparisons a Day and Beyond
description: SCAMP is a highly efficient CPU/GPU implementation of the Matrix Profile, with tiling for large inputs and cloud-scale capabilities.
